author: Luke Lee
description: All-in-One Presence Detection System - combines WiFi MQTT detection, GPS geofencing, Anyone logic, manual override, and delayed away. Includes individual presence drivers and composite aggregation driver for 'anyone home' functionality
releaseNotes: Version 0.4.1 - Convert Anyone Presence to Motion Sensor capability: Changed from Generic Component Presence Sensor to Generic Component Motion Sensor with 'motion' attribute using 'active'/'inactive' values. Renamed device from 'Anyone Presence' to 'Anyone Motion' while maintaining same aggregation logic.
